buttons

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • buttons.Button
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageButton, TextButton

    public abstract class Button
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a general button in a game or menu, to be clicked on.

    • Constructor Summary

              float y,

        Creates a new Button object with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the button
        y - the y-coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Draws the button on a PApplet
        Parameters:
        p - the PApplet onto which the button will be drawn

      • isPointInButton

        public boolean isPointInButton(float px,
                               float py)
        Parameters:
        px - the x-coordinate of the point
        py - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point (px, py) is inside the button, otherwise false
